participant_1.background:
I grew up with my mother and dogs and now we are close.
I am from a place where rain is always welcome.
I lost my job but I am grateful for the support of my friends and family.
I have a lot of feelings, and I like to write them down in my journal.
i love lasagna like i m garfield.

participant_2.background:
I do my laundry on a weekly basis.
I used to wear tight clothes, but now I prefer more comfortable options.
i like to play outside.
My family is not very wealthy, but we do what we can to help those in need.
I'm trying to make up for my past mistakes by using my engineering skills to help make the world a better place.

content.text: Hi there! I am going to be doing some writing today and wanted to see if you wanted to join me.
I love to write! I have been trying to write a story for a while now but haven't been able to get started.
What kind of story are you trying to write?
I am not sure yet, I am still trying to figure it out.
I could help you brainstorm some ideas if you would like.
That would be great! Thank you!
What do you want your story to be about?
I think I would like to write a story about a character who has lost everything and is trying to rebuild their life.
That sounds like a great idea! I think you could write a really moving story about that.
Thank you! I think I am going to start working on it tonight.
That's great! I can't wait to hear how it goes!
Thanks! I will keep you updated.
